name: claude-pr-analisys
description: A TypeScript module that uses Claude AI to analyze Jira tasks, GitHub diffs and code context to provide feedback on PRs

scripts.test: npm run build && JIRA_TICKET_PREFIX=TEST GITHUB_REPOSITORY=test-org/test-repo node src/tests/analyze-pr.test.js && JIRA_TICKET_PREFIX=TEST GITHUB_REPOSITORY=test-org/test-repo node src/tests/comment-pr.test.js && JIRA_TICKET_PREFIX=TEST GITHUB_REPOSITORY=test-org/test-repo node src/tests/pr-utils.test.js
scripts.test:dist: npm run build && JIRA_TICKET_PREFIX=TEST GITHUB_REPOSITORY=test-org/test-repo JIRA_API_TOKEN=test JIRA_SERVER_URL=https://test.atlassian.net JIRA_USER_EMAIL=test@test.com node src/tests/analyze-pr.test.js && JIRA_TICKET_PREFIX=TEST GITHUB_REPOSITORY=test-org/test-repo JIRA_API_TOKEN=test JIRA_SERVER_URL=https://test.atlassian.net JIRA_USER_EMAIL=test@test.com node src/tests/comment-pr.test.js && JIRA_TICKET_PREFIX=TEST GITHUB_REPOSITORY=test-org/test-repo JIRA_API_TOKEN=test JIRA_SERVER_URL=https://test.atlassian.net JIRA_USER_EMAIL=test@test.com node src/tests/pr-utils.test.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run build:watch & npm run test
scripts.test:compiled: npm run build && echo 'Testing compiled analyze-pr...' && JIRA_TICKET_PREFIX=TEST GITHUB_REPOSITORY=test-org/test-repo node dist/analyze-pr.js || echo '✅ analyze-pr usage shown' && echo 'Testing compiled comment-pr...' && JIRA_TICKET_PREFIX=TEST GITHUB_REPOSITORY=test-org/test-repo node dist/comment-pr.js || echo '✅ comment-pr usage shown'
scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run typecheck
scripts.quality:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.check-all: npm run quality && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.ci:quality: npm run lint:ci && npm run format:ci && npm run typecheck
scripts.ci:test: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.ci:build: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Anthony Rizzo
